jokes.joke: Remember, this is just a game! It's a much bigger problem in real life.
I'm trying to rebrand Gerrymandering. It gives us politicians a bad name.
Red, Blue? Who cares. With your skill, I bet you could make Green win.
Don't be afraid to really play with what the word 'contiguous' means!
If you can't change a voter's mind, just move em!
You sure got a magic finger there!
